ItemDesc: Upon use, immediately heals a single ally by <unbreak>24%</unbreak> of their Max HP plus <unbreak>300</unbreak> extra Max HP.
ItemBGDesc: Your lips and tongue yearn for juicy meat, your stomach craving to be filled â€” even the air seems to carry the scent of charcoal. Your belly emits a thunderous roar, and you struggle to maintain control.\n\n"There are few desires in this world that are as insatiable as this one."
